title: Bike Racks, Electric Stovetops, Refrigerators
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '0', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Square Feet:', '320', 'Address:', '9500 Zelzah Avenue', 'Our community is in the City of Los Angeles, located in the San Fernando Valley region.', 'The Meridian Pointe neighborhood is home to California State University, Northridge (CSUN), the Northridge Fashion Center, and a diverse selection of popular Los Angeles shopping and dining.', 'Our property has state-of-the-art amenities that make living at Meridian Pointe convenient.', 'All our residents have access to our large sparkling swimming pool and spa, lounge area, conference rooms, and study areas.', 'We have a fully-equipped fitness center with free weights, on-site laundry rooms, vending machines, and BBQ/picnic areas to hang out with friends and family and enjoy the outdoors!', 'We also offer furniture rentals at your convenience.', 'Amenities Include:', 'The Zone with Fitness Center, Game Room, Resident Lounge, Media Room, and Private Study Rooms', 'Bike Racks', 'Microwave Ovens', 'Junior Olympic Size Pool', 'Electric Stovetops', 'Granite Countertops', 'Gated Parking', 'Beach Volleyball Court', 'Gas BBQs and Picnic Area', 'Resort-Style Amenities', 'Refrigerators', 'Swimming Pool and Spa', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
